channel.title: 562 Help With Connecting
channel.description:
Windows Vista (x64). (Linksys router)
K, as you can see; I'm having problems with people connecting to my server.
I portforwarded correctly, I have Gotten a Static-IP, I did everything that any tutorial has told me to do. I got my no-ip, but idk if i set the IP right in the client. If you only set the IP in client.java, and you set that to your no-ip, then I did it right. I am using the Ember-Scape Base.
I also have tried using Utorrent. Does not work. Everything stops at connecting to update server EVERY time I run this. Once again, I set the IP right, and Yes, I know how to connect to it, But no one else can? wtf...
Anyway, can someone please help? Teamviwer is an option. Thanks.

item.title: 562 Help With Connecting
item.dc:creator: @kryst-scape kryst-scape
item.description:
@kryst-scape wrote:

Windows Vista (x64). (Linksys router)

K, as you can see; I’m having problems with people connecting to my server.

I portforwarded correctly, I have Gotten a Static-IP, I did everything that any tutorial has told me to do.
I got my no-ip, but idk if i set the IP right in the client. If you only set the IP in client.java, and you set that to your no-ip, then I did it right.
I am using the Ember-Scape Base.

I also have tried using Utorrent. Does not work. Everything stops at connecting to update server EVERY time I run this. Once again, I set the IP right, and Yes, I know how to connect to it, But no one else can? wtf…

Anyway, can someone please help? Teamviwer is an option. Thanks.
